name: projects/1017425675889/locations/europe-west3/instances/a099fd02-80fc-4a0f-a80c-fb5d7fe78564/rules/ru_3866edac-3fbf-4347-93b1-d606a55edf95
text:
rule gcti_malicious_file_process_launch {

  meta:
    author = "Google Cloud Security"
    description = "Use Google Cloud Threat Intel hash intelligence to scan for malicious process launch activity"
    type = "alert"
    tags = "vt, gcti"
    data_source = "all"
    severity = "High"
    priority = "High"

  events:
    $malicious.metadata.event_type = "PROCESS_LAUNCH"
    $malicious.target.process.file.sha256 = $file
    // Severity is one of NONE, LOW, MEDIUM, HIGH.
    $malicious.target.process.file.security_result.severity = $severity
    // Google Cloud Threat Intel file verdict result is one of UNDETECTED, SUSPICIOUS, MALICIOUS
    $malicious.target.process.file.security_result.threat_verdict = "MALICIOUS"

  match:
    $file over 5m

  outcome:
    // Risk score based on severity.
    $risk_score = max(if($severity = "NONE", 0) +
                    if($severity = "LOW", 20) +
                    if($severity = "MEDIUM", 40) +
                    if($severity = "HIGH", 60))
    $event_count = count_distinct($malicious.metadata.id)
    // added to populate alert graph with additional context
    $principal_ip = array_distinct($malicious.principal.ip)
    $target_ip = array_distinct($malicious.target.ip)
    $principal_process_pid = array_distinct($malicious.principal.process.pid)
    $principal_process_command_line = array_distinct($malicious.principal.process.command_line)
    $principal_process_file_sha256 = array_distinct($malicious.principal.process.file.sha256)
    $principal_process_file_full_path = array_distinct($malicious.principal.process.file.full_path)
    $principal_process_product_specfic_process_id = array_distinct($malicious.principal.process.product_specific_process_id)
    $principal_process_parent_process_product_specfic_process_id = array_distinct($malicious.principal.process.parent_process.product_specific_process_id)
    $target_process_pid = array_distinct($malicious.target.process.pid)
    $target_process_command_line = array_distinct($malicious.target.process.command_line)
    $target_process_file_sha256 = array_distinct($malicious.target.process.file.sha256)
    $target_process_file_full_path = array_distinct($malicious.target.process.file.full_path)
    $target_process_product_specfic_process_id = array_distinct($malicious.target.process.product_specific_process_id)
    $target_process_parent_process_product_specfic_process_id = array_distinct($malicious.target.process.parent_process.product_specific_process_id)
    $principal_user_userid = array_distinct($malicious.principal.user.userid)
    $target_user_userid = array_distinct($malicious.target.user.userid)

  condition:
    $malicious and $risk_score >=40
}
author: Google Cloud Security

metadata.description: Use Google Cloud Threat Intel hash intelligence to scan for malicious process launch activity
